argument.name: settings
argument.description: Settings for the audio recorder. This will override the initial values of the properties of the A5.audio.Recorder class.

property.name: heartbeat
property.description: Rate of heartbeat in seconds, "0" equals no heartbeat, the default in "0.25".

property.name: maxDuration
property.description: Maximum duration of audio recording in seconds. A value of "0" or less allow for any recording duration.

property.name: fidelity
property.description: Recording fidelity. Values can be "very-high", "high", "medium", "low" and "very-low". The default is "medium".

property.name: onStart
property.description: Event for when recording is initiated.

property.name: onChange
property.description: Event fired when audio recorder state changes.

property.name: onPause
property.description: Event fired when recording is paused.

property.name: onResume
property.description: Event fired when recording is resumed.

property.name: onStop
property.description: Event fired when the recording is stopped.

property.name: onSuccess
property.description: Event fired when the recording is done, and the file is saved.

argument.name: src
argument.description: The full source URL of the recording.

property.name: onError
property.description: Event fired when there is an error with the recording.

property.name: onDone
property.description: Event fired when the recording is done, regardless of if it succeeded or failed.

property.name: state
property.description: The state of the audio player. State is updated by audio events, if you want to refresh "stale" state information use the A5.audio.Player.getState() method.

property.name: src
property.description: The source of the recording. If no recording is active, the srouce will be "false", otherwise the source will be an unresolved URL untill the onSuccess event fires.

property.name: level
property.description: Level of recording volume between 0.0 and 1.0. Note: this is not acurate, but gives an idea of the recording.

property.name: duration
property.description: Maximum allowed duration of the recording in seconds.
